synopsis.text:
April 23rd marks the release of a delightful new OVA for the beloved anime, 'Chi's Sweet Home.' This charming 10-minute episode comes bundled with the 7th volume of the manga and promises a heartwarming adventure. In this new installment, Chi's father struggles to adjust her new collar, leading to an unexpected journey for the curious kitten.

Deciding to explore the park while her father fiddles with the collar, Chi encounters the territorial Kocchi near a fountain. Despite Kocchi's attempts to drive her away, the naive and playful Chi remains oblivious to his intentions and simply wishes to engage in a fun playtime.

However, finding the perfect spot to call her own proves challenging, as Chi navigates through boisterous children and frolicking dogs. Eventually, Chi discovers an ideal place, only to be met with Kocchi's reluctance to share his territory. Will Chi's infectious playfulness win over the protective Kocchi? Join Chi in this delightful escapade, filled with laughter and endearing moments.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
